Item.Value: [Name][Text:Planks are in place, now just gotta wait for-]
[Name][Text:Well speak of the Devil! Welcome to the $WorldObject_39$, you're gonna be spending some time here. Come on, I'll show you around.]

[Name][Text:So I've placed the main things you need to worry about right here. Place any logs you want cut into planks in the bin on the left, and every day when I finish work, I'll place the lumber on the table in front of us. The $WorldObject_92$ is over here...]

[Name][Text:Like most buildings, we've got a machine here. If you interact with it, you can see what I can make as well as how much I can process in a day. We're going to need a lot of lumber going forward, so I need you to keep me stocked so we can stay ahead of any building needs we may have. Oh, and before I forget, you should know I also sell, furniture, and other decorative items for the town.]
